title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2929/93 of 25 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 223/90 as regards the rate of Community part-financing applicable in Greece, Italy and the United Kingdom (Northern Ireland) for the measures referred to in Regulation (EEC) No 2328/91
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2929/93 of 25 October 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 223/90 as regards the rate of Community part-financing applicable in Greece, Italy and the United Kingdom (Northern Ireland) for the measures referred to in  Regulation (EEC) No 2328/91
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In Annex I to Regulation (EEC) No 223/90, all the indents and rates are replaced by the following:
"" ID="01">'- Portugal, Greece (compensatory allowances), Italy (compensatory allowances)> ID="02">75 %"> ID="01">- Greece (other measures), Ireland, United Kingdom (Northern Ireland)> ID="02">65 %"> ID="01">- France (overseas departments)>  ID="02">60 %"> ID="01">- France (Corsica), Italy (other measures), Spain> ID="02">50 %'.">
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.

shall apply to expenditure in Greece and Italy for 1993 and to expenditure in the United Kingdom (Northern Ireland) for 1992 and 1993.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 218, 6. 8. 1991, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 182, 24. 7. 1993, p. 12.
(3) OJ No L 22, 27. 1. 1990, p. 62.
(4) OJ No L 364, 12. 12. 1992, p. 27.
